00040 /** Conversion utility for transforming vectors to column vectors. */
00041 template <typename T1>
00042 ColumnVector columnVectorFromVector(const std::vector<T1>& v) {
00043   ColumnVector x;
00044   x.ReSize(v.size());
00045   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
00046     x.element(i) = v[i];
00047   }
00048   return x;
00049 }
00050 
00051 /** Conversion utility for transforming arrays to column vectors. */
00052 template <typename T1>
00053 ColumnVector columnVectorFromArray(const T1 * const array, const int count) {
00054   ColumnVector x;
00055   x.ReSize(count);
00056   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00057     x.element(i) = array[i];
00058   }
00059   return x;
00060 }
00061 
00062 /** utility: print out newmat column vector */
00063 void printColumnVector(ColumnVector &v, std::ostream *out, const std::string& delim);
00064 
00065 /** utility: */
00066 std::string stringColumnVector(const ColumnVector &v, const std::string& delim);

00073 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<unsigned char> vec);
00074 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<int   > vec);
00075 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<float > vec);
00076 void printVec(const std::string& lbl,const std::vector<double> vec);

00082 /** utility: */
00083 
00084 /** Conversion utility for transforming arrays to matrices. */
00085 template <typename T1>
00086 Matrix matrixFromArray(const T1 * const array, int count, int nRow, int nCol) {
00087   Matrix m(nRow, nCol);
00088   assert(nRow * nCol == count);
00089   for(int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00090     int col = i / nRow;
00091     int row = i - col * nRow;
00092     m.element(row, col) = array[i];
00093   }
00094   return m;
00095 }
00096 
00097 /** utility: */
00098 Matrix elementMultiplication(Matrix &x, Matrix &y);
00099 
00100 /** utility: print out newmat Matrix */
00101 void printMatrix(Matrix &m, std::ostream *out, const std::string& delim);
00102

00104 std::string stringMatrix(Matrix &m, const std::string& delim);
